text: Greencoat UK Wind is a British investment company investing in UK wind farms based in London, England. Established in 2012, it is listed on the London Stock Exchange and is a constituent of the FTSE 250 Index. The company's Chairman is Tim Ingram. Greencoat Capital LLP acts as investment manager to Greencoat UK Wind plc. ==References== ==External links== * Official site Category:Companies listed on the London Stock Exchange Category:Investment companies of the United Kingdom
title: Greencoat UK Wind
